website_summaries.verdict: A very popular Dutch oven that is tough to beat for the price.
pros: Made of a combination of aluminum for even heating and heavy-gauge stainless steel for long-lasting strength

customer_reviews.title: The pot is fine, but a dutch oven needs an oven safe ...
customer_reviews.text: The glass lid shattered in a 275 degree oven ruining my beef roast and creating a huge mess. The pot is fine, but a dutch oven needs an oven safe lid. Calphalon is sending a replacement lid, but I will not risk another disaster. So for now I just have a big pot to use on the cooktop. I'm searching for a metal lid so I can use this pot safely as a dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Does great job with baking and holds enough for a large ...
customer_reviews.text: fabulous. Heavy, on the stove and in. Does great job with baking and holds enough for a large family. Easy to clean and very useful. I can brown on stove, and then put in the oven to bake or roast, covered or uncovered. And, serve from it on the stove top after. GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne P.

customer_reviews.title: Light but excellent slow-cooking pot. Bonus - Glass lid!
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight pot for my 86 year old mother who still makes home mades slow cook chuck roast. The glass lid is perfect. We have a Le Creuset enameled pot that also works great but is too heavy for my mom to lift and doe not have the glass lid. Sooooo much easier to handle this one.
customer_reviews.author: SandyB

customer_reviews.title: The best pan to work with for all kitchen cooking
customer_reviews.text: HANDS DOWN: The best pan to work with for all kitchen cooking. I use it more than any other pan I have, and I have most of the other pans from this set. I even bought this as a wedding gift for a friend of mine who doesn't cook a lot, and he and his wife admitted they use this all the time now. Regardless of what price you pay for this pan, get it - it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: PontoonPilot

customer_reviews.title: best of the best
customer_reviews.text: love it, until I got a Le Creuset Signature Cast-Iron Round Dutch . but still use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SIZE BUT TOO LIGHT WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: The size and shape of the pan are great for making stews and soups. But its light weight and small handles make it feel unstable for stovetop use. It's probably best for oven use, like pot roast.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D.

customer_reviews.title: Best Dutch Lven
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot. So easy to cook in and clean. Last one I will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: S. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: We use this almost every day. Large enough for double recipe soups. Heavyweight and quality construction. Cleans easily with steel wool. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: rosanne

customer_reviews.title: Just a beautiful pot, a bit heavy but beautiful and purposeful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for myself and my health conscious sons who cook for their families rather eating out. One of them scorched his by mistake hence his pot lost the “nonstick” ability hence the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the "turbo boiler" burner on my stove...
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a new stove, one that had an oversize "turbo boiler" burner, and all of our pots and pans were just a little too small for use on the turbo burner. This dutch oven is just wide enough that it cover the flames. Was able to sear off some chicken & sausage on the stove and then transfer to the oven to finish cooking. Afterwards, a little beer in the bottom of the pan to deglaze and make a sauce, and all the crispy bits came off.
customer_reviews.author: M. Akins

customer_reviews.title: Great dutch oven
customer_reviews.text: Wife calls this the best cooking pot we've ever had. Makes terrific stews and soups, and doubles as a roaster.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a whole set of calphlon that I purchased 15 years ago and it is still going strong. This new pot has met all my expectations. GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: RONO

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Dutch oven. Perfect size& shape for arroz con pollo or corned beef & cabbage!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Dutch oven is really big and works great when you are cooking rice and beans and other homemade goodness. Despite that it is made in China, it still seems to be made of high quality. I recommend this product to anyone looking for a big dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: Zangetsu

customer_reviews.title: This Dutch oven is versatile, a pleasure to use, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: After researching similar items on the web I chose this model as the best combination of features and quality for the price. I put in my cart while I attempted to figure out a strategy for justifying this purchase to my wife. The next day I was shocked to see a $20 price drop! Bam! Order made. I have been completely satisfied and always look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: D in KC

customer_reviews.title: Great pot!
customer_reviews.text: I have been thinking about getting a pot like this for years. I am glad I finally bought it. This is a great pot! I love using it to make soups, sauteing chicken, preparing stews, etc. It is stock pot sized but is wider & shorter than a stock pot which I think makes it more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Great pot!
customer_reviews.text: A nice open pot. I wanted a large capacity stock pot that was wide but not tall, like most are. This one fit the bit perfectly. It is not overly heavy and appears to be well made. It heats evenly and the lid fits nicely, providing for good steam capture while cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Velikova

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size pot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for family soup on rainy days. Takes extra effort to keep the stainless clean, dry right away and place on the shelf
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Love it for making stews, soups and jams. Great everyday piece.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and results
customer_reviews.text: This Dutch oven is quite big and we have only used a couple times for group meals. But overall the results are excellent. The pot holds significant food and is easy to clean. The construction is good and we are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund J Bevan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the stock pot. It’s a well made pot for the money. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J.L. Schoepke

customer_reviews.title: good sturdy pot
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and depth of this. It is not too deep. The pot is nice and heavy weight which is better for slow cooking than a thin pot. The glass top is nice. If you can't lift a heavy pot, this is not for you. Price is reasonable, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect 12" diameter, goes from stovetop to oven with ease. Even heat, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Youness

customer_reviews.title: I love my Calphalon Pot
customer_reviews.text: I love my Calphalon Pot, it is perfect for cooking any and everything. And this was quite a deal at $59.99
customer_reviews.author: Anthonette Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I expected but it’s ok; it serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good and size wise too to cook bigger quantity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: Wife just love this Dutch oven 8 quart pot. It will be used many years to come. I would recommend this to any of the ladies out there looking for a Dutch oven to consider this one. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: tim-the-toolman-at-ur-service

customer_reviews.title: Pots and Pans
customer_reviews.text: Found that soaking with Dawn detergent works to keep the clean shine.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my 80 year old mom ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 80 year old mom, who still loves to cook, but had a hard time with traditional ceramic dutch oven as they are oh-so-heavy...this one works for her.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: works on my induction burner and is excellent quality. The fit and finnish is great. and.easy to clean stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Folston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pan holds the heat and cleaned up easily perfect for stew pot roast chicken cacciatore
customer_reviews.author: george r.scia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pot
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for one just this size/shape, and finally found this one. Very nice pot, cleans up well, cooks evenly, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: RobynB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect depth
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking sauces in this pot. It allows the sauce to reduce quickly.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: comment
customer_reviews.text: good quality nice size easy cleaning love it very much love the fact that it cooks evenly and that the price is right
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite pan to use. Heats evenly and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gail R.

customer_reviews.title: LOVING THIS POT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pot!! It's a great size and I love that it's not too tall like a stock pot and is wide. I enjoy using it to cook spaghetti, soup/gumbo, chili, roasting meat etc. I'm glad I decided to purchase as this pot will last many years. Definitely worth every penny!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Walker

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pot!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite pot! I like making soups and chili and I like making a LOT at a time so I get plenty of leftovers. This pot is just the right size, I love the see-through lid. High quality, attractive and highly functional!
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Leiva

customer_reviews.title: A solid addition
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality dutch oven that we've used many times. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: David D Welch

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have room to store it
customer_reviews.text: This pan is massive! I knew it would be larger than the 7 qt. one I was replacing so I measured the height and depth of the cupboard area I wanted to put it in, what I forgot to measure was the width to get it in to the cabinet. I'm now in the process of putting up a hanging pot rack. Even with that little hiccup though this is a fantastic pan! I made a huge pot of soup yesterday, the pan cooked beautifully and cleaned up in a breeze. If you make lots of soups, stews, chili etc, this is the pan for you!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great induction ready cookware
customer_reviews.text: This cookware is induction ready as another reviewer mentioned, even though the product description does not mention it. It is great to use for large batches as it holds 8 quarts but more convenient than a stockpot because it is wider and shorter .
customer_reviews.author: DennyC

customer_reviews.title: Prefer hard-anodized aluminum dutch oven
customer_reviews.text: I love Calphalon, but I didn't like the stainless and returned it. I have several pots/pans that are triple-layer sear nonstick of hard-anodized aluminum that I absolutely love. Unfortunately, Calphalon discontinued the dutch oven I wanted. I was lucky to find one in a local store. This is not a reflection on the quality or usefulness of the stainless steel. It just wasn't what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for roasts and large quantities!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I used a gift card for this item. I do put the lid in the oven while it is preheating.
customer_reviews.author: KL Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Spacious
customer_reviews.text: This is a stunning Dutch Oven. It is very large and could feed a lot of people!
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations and more.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Perfect for braising large quantities. Bonus is that the lid works for my large shallow pan too.
customer_reviews.author: Parth Upadhye

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon Dutch Oven
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for asian style of cooking. From curries to broths and other south asian dishes. Sturdy and does the job as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Sauce doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: This pot is wonderful for making spaghetti sauce. There's plenty of room for my meatballs and without the problem of bubbling over. Clean-up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is thrilled with her new Dutch oven. She loves the large size and the way it cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Myra D Raiche

customer_reviews.title: Great Pot!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our kitchen. I was worried about cleaning an all stainless pot but so far it has been a breeze. The discoloration from boiling water or scrambling eggs disappears with a little Bar Keepers Friend.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware EVER
customer_reviews.text: If you need ONLY one pan, this is the BEST. I've made soup, fried chicken, sauces, pasta etc...great temperature, secure lid and cleans up easily!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love Mermaids

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered 2
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 as wedding presents for friends and they work OK. I am spoiled though, mine are Le Crueset.
customer_reviews.author: C. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Does a nice job with pot roast, but I expected a higher quality. I have only high quality Calphalon cookware, and this dutch oven does not meet those standards. I guess for the price it's OK!
customer_reviews.author: Barnmaster

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is more than induction ready
customer_reviews.text: All of our residential cookwares failed the "induction ready" test. Not a single cookware in our house was induction ready when tried on the new NuWave Gold that I ordered and received from Amazon last week. So I decided to order and try this "Calphalon Contemporary Stainless Steel 8-Quart..". This is amazing,not just induction ready but seems built for it purposely (water boiled in no time). It is also well built, sturdy, right sized, low height (for stew, etc, just like we wanted it). I am surprised by the quality of the material, a bit thick and heavy. but responsive to induction cooktop that we own (NuWave 30242 PIC Gold).
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: So very happy with this beautiful pan
customer_reviews.text: So very happy with this beautiful pan! The size is really very practical because the 8qt stock pots are deep and hard to make roast or potato salad! Just great being able to start on stove top then into the oven, also it's not to heavy to lift but very well made! Great product!! Thank you 🤗
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: loose lid
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have only used this pot twice. If you are making something where you want a lid to have an exact fit to keep moisture in, this is not the pot for you. You can see what's in the pot left by the gap of a loose fitting lid. Otherwise, performed well and was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: DAG

customer_reviews.title: Quality! But big make sure you need 8qt
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to replace my junky set. The weight and finish of this product should speak for its self. If you enjoy cooking or know someone who is a cook I would recommend you purchase this item. 8qt is quite large you can fit about 3 whole chickens in this thing!
customer_reviews.author: S.G.A

customer_reviews.title: 8qt Dutch oven
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful pan but it is only 5" deep not the 6.6" that is stated. It is 8 quarts right up to the edge so it's really more like a 7 quart pot.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy weight
customer_reviews.text: It's a beauty. Good sturdy weight, excellent size for cooking large stovetop meals. Heats up well and cleans up easily. My favorite pan for everything. After 2 yrs it is still as perfect as the day 1 got it. I have used this in the oven with the lid to slow cook ribs, and it is super easy to handle as well as to wash off. Barkeeper's Friend work amazingly well to polish the bottoms and give it back a shine.
customer_reviews.author: H and KTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great pot, with a see through lid!
customer_reviews.text: I love making soups and this is a nice large pot, that is wide and not so high so I can saute', add ingredients, everything in this one pot. Being able to see what's going on through the see through lid is great. I'll never use a metal lid again! As always, Amazon had it delivered quickly!
customer_reviews.author: NANCY HILL

customer_reviews.title: good product, stainless cookwares rule.
customer_reviews.text: large size and good quality. it is a little bit pricey, but i think it's worth the price you pay. stainless means it's very low maintenance, unlike cast iron which you need to season and oil up from time to time; also much more durable than those ceramic clay ones.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great for cooking for 10-12 people
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great for cooking for 10-12 people. Reacts well (no hot spots), love the direct-to-oven feature, won't scratch like my old enamel-clad cast iron oven, and it's very easy to clean (aside from its size). Used in a field camp (i.e., daily) and holding up very well so far.
customer_reviews.author: deal finder

customer_reviews.title: This pot is worth every dollar!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new 8qt. pot it’s perfect for making soup, frying fish, making my baked Ziti there’s no end to the possibilities...😘
customer_reviews.author: T. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Best Dutch Oven
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a while and I think this is a great choice. I did not want a non stick that would wear out and I was wary of an enamel coated dutch oven that would chip. This pot works like a charm. Cooked up a large pot of chicken and sausage gumbo and it was just the right size for my recipe. The pot was very easy to clean and it looks great. I highly recommend this 8 quart dutch oven.
customer_reviews.author: D. Meaux

customer_reviews.title: This pan was a great investment. Thick enough to cook be sturdy and ...
customer_reviews.text: This pan was a great investment. Thick enough to cook be sturdy and stable without being too heavy to lift when it's full of chicken stock or boiling potatoes! Big enough to cook 10 pounds of potatoes in one batch... This pan is a smart investment for anyone planning to cook "family sized" meals.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy 8 qt pan
customer_reviews.text: This completes my set of large pans. All Calphalon. All great to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bushnell

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is extremely durable, and a great addition to our kitchen. I love the large capacity. We use it for many things and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: but very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of wide and heavy for me, but very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Pella

customer_reviews.title: I recently changed all my pans from nonstick teflon to ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently changed all my pans from nonstick teflon to stainless Calphalon because of the health risks associated with some nonstick pans. They have served me well in the month I've owned them and I hope to acquire a few more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Karee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: It feels solid with good quality construction and finish. It is 4.75 inches high without the cover. Easy to clean. There is no vent hole on the cover but it fits loose with about 1/8 inch movement side to side. The cover handle gets too hot for bare hands.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: ... the size i'm looking for and not too expensive like some other ones
customer_reviews.text: just the size i'm looking for and not too expensive like some other ones, hope it will last a long time

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.text: this is by far the best pot I have ever owned

customer_reviews.title: Great pot.
customer_reviews.text: You just can't go wrong with a Calphalon stainless pot.

customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful. Easy to clean and cooks well. I really like it and so does everybody that has seen it.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dutch oven. Even heat , big enough to cook a real meal and and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an 8inch Dutch oven, look no further! I really enjoy cooking with it, and the convenience to go from stove top to oven is great!

customer_reviews.title: Great dutch oven.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. This is a great dutch oven and works like a champ - big, solid, good stainless steel and heats very evenly. We use it on the stove top, so can't speak to in the oven.

customer_reviews.title: After first use there was pitting and staining in bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: After first use there was pitting and staining in bottom. It was used to make gravy. This should not occur.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookware for the price
customer_reviews.text: 8qt. Dutch oven. Excellent cookware for the price. Looks great, distributes heat very well, will buy other products from this line.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was great, I cooked an entire chicken, with all the veggies in it with no problem. It cleaned up so easy, I am very,very satisfied with it. And the fact that I have a new induction cook top, the two work great!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing item! I cook with it ALL the time. A+++
customer_reviews.author: ABC317

customer_reviews.title: 8-qt. Dutch Oven is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The 8-qt. Dutch Oven is perfect. I love that it is wider as apposed to taller, it makes it much easier to use. It heats up quickly and evenly. It is the perfect size for making homemade stocks, etc. I love the contemporary styling. I would recommend it to anyone considering purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gabrielsen

customer_reviews.title: Mega pot..Mega meal!
customer_reviews.text: Super size to cook and serve in. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie D

customer_reviews.title: Home made Soups
customer_reviews.text: This 8-quart Dutch oven is the right size for home made soups. Have been a great pan to add to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: horsehide

customer_reviews.title: The cook thanks me for it
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted something big enough to cook a lot of roast for family gatherings or to take meals to people. I wanted something I could clean up easily by hand, unlike the worn enamel pot he used to use. This has been perfect. It's sturdy. He loves the large size and the glass lid to see how it's doing without opening it. I like the way it comes clean. It has had frequent use--and he thanks me for it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Merle K. Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the person seemed happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ivory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We've had this item for about 3 months now. Excellent product. Not complaints so far. Cleaning is very easy. Just be sure you want the 8qt before ordering. It sure is huge.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT seller! Perfect for my Mom for Christmas! She'll love it. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in this pot
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this pot. I only used it one time and boiled pasta in it. After the pot was cold, I hand washed it, and wiped it with a towel. To my dismay it had several blemishes in the bottom of the pot . This pot is not nearly the same quality as my hard anodized Calphalon pots.
customer_reviews.author: Rodroc

customer_reviews.title: nice pot!
customer_reviews.text: very nice pot. solid construction. very durable. cleans up well. the wife loves it for making sauce, chili, etc. nice alternative to the tall stock pots.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product. Exactly as described. Heavy, but not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim K.

customer_reviews.title: A Dutch Oven to last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: If you're wondering if it's worth the price, it is. This pan is quality! The handles do not get hot. It is easy to wash completely clean, and it's huge enough for a pot of stew to feed a crowd or a roast with pounds and pounds of potatoes. I am more than satisfied with this purchase. (I've written a more detailed review over at Hubpages.com.)
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Quick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome to use. However it has holes in the bottom, when Boling water for softboiled eggs bubbles rise in 5 places this causes contaminating of food worry.
customer_reviews.author: ROMERO

customer_reviews.title: Lid is damaged
customer_reviews.text: I got it on time and the pot worked but the lid would not fit on the pot. I am not sure if it was suppose to be like that or should i send it back and get a new one?
customer_reviews.author: RJ

product_meta.title: Calphalon Contemporary Stainless Steel Cookware, Dutch Oven, 8-quart
product_meta.description:
Use this large Dutch oven to brown or sear meats, then add other ingredients to prepare savory stews and meat sauce. It's oven safe, so allowing you the option to finish recipes in the oven. Bring stunning, contemporary design to your kitchen with Calphalon Contemporary Stainless cookware. Crafted from lustrous, brushed stainless steel, clean lines and curvaceous silhouettes, Contemporary Stainless epitomizes the soul of modern style with professional performance and dishwasher-safe convenience.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: A heavy-gauge aluminum core is sandwiched between two layers of stainless steel by means of high-heat, high-pressure impact bonding for extreme durability.
Aluminum core provides superior conductivity and even heating for excellent browning and control of the cooking process. Non-porous stainless steel cooking surface is safe for use with all utensils.
Clear tempered-glass lids let you see food while it's cooking and are oven safe, so you can finish covered dishes in the oven or keep them warm until ready to serve
Long, brushed stainless steel handles stay cool on the stovetop. All cookware is dishwasher-safe and carries Calphalon's full lifetime warranty.
Ideal for searing and braising meats, browning meats for savory stews, and preparing delicious soups. Domed lid with inside points allows continuous self-basting for flavorful meats.
